name: localfarmer
description: Im Rahmen eines Gruppenprojekts entwickelte Single Page App.

scripts.build: npm run clean && parcel build src/*.html --public-url . --detailed-report --experimental-scope-hoisting
scripts.watch: npm run clean && parcel watch src/*.html --public-url . --detailed-report --experimental-scope-hoisting

author: Malte Ganzer, Jannik Leuthold, Daniel Lupu
